\* nat
-N KUMA_MESH_INBOUND
-N KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND
-N KUMA_MESH_INBOUND_REDIRECT
-N KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND_REDIRECT
-A PREROUTING -p tcp -j KUMA_MESH_INBOUND
-A OUTPUT -p tcp --dport 1900,1902,1000-2000 -m owner --uid-owner 103,104,106-108 -j RETURN
-A OUTPUT -p tcp --dport 2900,2902,3000-5000 -m owner --uid-owner 203,204,206-208 -j RETURN
-A OUTPUT -p udp --dport 3900,3902,4000-6000 -m owner --uid-owner 303,304,306-308 -j RETURN
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -j KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND
-A KUMA_MESH_INBOUND -p tcp -j KUMA_MESH_INBOUND_REDIRECT
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -s (.*) -o (.*) -j RETURN
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -p tcp -o (.*) ! -d (.*) -m owner --uid-owner 0 -j KUMA_MESH_INBOUND_REDIRECT
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -p tcp -o (.*) -m owner ! --uid-owner 0 -j RETURN
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -m owner --uid-owner 0 -j RETURN
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -d (.*) -j RETURN
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND -j KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND_REDIRECT
-A KUMA_MESH_INBOUND_REDIRECT -p tcp -j REDIRECT --to-ports (15006|15010)
-A KUMA_MESH_OUTBOUND_REDIRECT -p tcp -j REDIRECT --to-ports 15001
COMMIT
Transparent proxy set up successfully
